title: NOTHING IS WORKING
body: My laptop crashes in the middle of the game and I can't even send in a ticket because the support page won't let me sign in on any of my devices. It only comes up with a white page. I can't get any help because it won't keep me logged in from the client page to the support page. This is bull.

replies.body:
Crashes can be caused by a few different factors, but by far crashes in the middle of the game are caused by poor driver interactions or hardware problems. I encourage you to work through our [Bugsplat & Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if that guide helped.

Can you give more details about the crash?
Does the game simply close, does it freeze up and stop responding, or is it something else entirely?
